I'm still going through the RK manga scanlation and found something 
that made me laugh out loud.  If it hadn't been for sec's obsession 
with a certain artist, it would've meant little to me beyond the 
subject of one of Tae's treasures, which she's offered to give to 
Kaoru to cheer her up after Kenshin's departure. MissB, you'll have 
to fight either Tae or Kaoru for it. (Tsubame may still have a copy 
of the key to Tae's house... )

The last name is misspelled (and probably that word too), but it has 
to be the right guy, ne?
http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/vwp?.dir=/&.src=gr&.dnm=rk_ta
e_the_collector.jpg&.view=t&.done=http%
3a//photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/lst%3f%26.dir=/%26.src=gr%
26.view=t

Should the link fail (which always happens to me no matter what I do 
to keep it from doing that), it's posted in the Photos section of the 
list site (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/ ) as tae_the_collector.

phil
